publ: by 深圳市语图科技有限公司
name: Morecam
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Morecam skill can only work with certain AC powered Wi-Fi cameras, not all cameras using Morecam APP can use Morecam skill, please consult the sellers if your product can support Alexa before using this skill.

To get started, please follow the steps below:
1. Install Morecam App from App Store and Google Play, connect the camera to Morecam App, keep it online and running.
2. Find Morecam Skill in Alexa App, click "Enable Skill" to link your camera with the Alexa account, then find your camera.
3. Try voice commands like "Alexa, show the living room" to get live videos and check everything's fine in your sweet home.

Below models supprot Alexa:
XTU models:
J10 Doorbell camera
J10Plus Doorbell camera
J9 Doorbell camera
J7 Doorbell camera
MR02 Doorbell camera

EUKI models
J10 Doorbell camera
J10Plus Doorbell camera
J9 Doorbell camera
J7 Doorbell camera
MR04 Doorbell camera
